line.comment: * always keeps moving between different factions and with minimum jump distance
* are we still crafting the best thing?
* we need to switch to something else, our Traders must stop stop buying more of our previous resource
* we wait to process the rest that they will still be bring to us
* wait here until they all arrived
* ^^^ an array of any of the 7 resources which the galaxy desperately needs more of
* the galaxy doesn't really need anything too much right now
* so we randomly travel the galaxy
* or craft that resource which is the least available
* we want to go down the entire production chain and check each required intermediate resource
* resource can also be Waste or Energy Cells which should always be available somewhere
* for about 12 hours we cannot switch to another product

sval.val: Regrouping to %s
Selecting a new Product
Task 0.
always keeps moving between different factions and with minimum jump distance
are we still crafting the best thing?
* ^^^ (only after 12h timeout!)
we need to switch to something else, our Traders must stop stop buying more of our previous resource
we wait to process the rest that they will still be bring to us
wait here until they all arrived
all our Traders are docked
^^^ an array of any of the 7 resources which the galaxy desperately needs more of
the galaxy doesn't really need anything too much right now
so we randomly travel the galaxy
or craft that resource which is the least available
the galaxy desperately needs something
we want to go down the entire production chain and check each required intermediate resource
can be Protein Paste
can be C-Ration / Chemicals
can be Ore / Microchips / Teladianium
resource can also be Waste or Energy Cells which should always be available somewhere
for about 12 hours we cannot switch to another product
